description:
The school festival is coming up and class 3-D has to decide what to do.
Maya, Ayumi, and Sakurakouji put on a show to convince their class that a play is the right choice. But is that enough to reach the passionless classmates of the present time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gakuensai o Atsuku Suru no Desu
Let`s Make the School Festival Passionate
学園祭を熱くするのです
